actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program to improve the identification, assessment, and treatment of patients in the emergency department who are at risk of suicide, and for other purposes.
short_title: Effective Suicide Screening and Assessment in the Emergency Department Act of 2019

titles.title: Effective Suicide Screening and Assessment in the Emergency Department Act of 2019

To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a program to improve the identification, assessment, and treatment of patients in the emergency department who are at risk of suicide, and for other purposes.
